text: How to program to have all processors on your machine used?
I am running a single-threaded python program that performs massive data processing on my windows box.
When I monitor the CPU usage in performance tab under Windows Task Manager, it shows that I am using only a very small fraction of the processing power available to me.
Only one processor is being used to the fullest and all the rest are almost idle.
What should I do to ensure that all my processors are used?
